s: ^"Put that mop down before you poke out an eye.."
^"Hey, do you know about that strange lady with the hat of tinfoil?"
^"I was told you can tell me what this place is about?"

The_Priest: ^Sheep: "Dont you use that foul language on HER HIGHNESS! Her voice is the rustle in the gras, making the words of the wind comprehensabble for human ears.
^Hers is the burden to spread the word of the great goddes Alu between all the fringe folk in this place."
Mop_Down: ^Sheep: "I cant see the path. I do need clarity. The priestes told me by cleansing this well of pollution, im getting closer to clarity."
Clarity: ^Sheep: "This is the harbour of lost souls.
